channel.title: Pokémon on home/pilbot
channel.description: Recent content in Pokémon on home/pilbot

item.title: Dexit Means Dexit
item.description: In the most controversial political move this century the Pokémon company has stated that in the Galar region we no longer “Gotta catch ‘em all"™, in fact we can’t they won’t all be available! Since the number of Pokémon in Kanto and Dunbar’s number are approximately equal I think that is a fair number of older Pokémon that will make it across the border. I’m assuming in Galar the legendary creatures can get a special visa or something.
